name: Tricky Trail RC
description: Tricky Trail RC - this arcade racing on the micro RC vehicle with logic elements. Each vehicle toy has its own ability. One powerful and strong and can push objects, the other small and can travel in tight spaces. Using the ability of each machine in the level, you will need to reach the finish line.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 gamepad are supported
